data_use.name: Provide the capability
data_use.description: Provide, give, or make available the product, service, application or system.

data_use.name: System
data_use.description: The source system, product, service or application being provided to the user.

data_use.name: System Operations
data_use.description: Use of specified data categories to operate and protect the system in order to provide the service.

data_use.name: Operations Support
data_use.description: Use of specified data categories to provide support for operation and protection of the system in order to provide the service.

data_use.name: Support Optimization
data_use.description: Use of specified data categories to optimize and improve support operations in order to provide the service.

data_use.name: Offer Upgrades
data_use.description: Offer upgrades or upsales such as increased capacity for the service based on monitoring of service usage.

data_use.name: Improve the capability
data_use.description: Improve the product, service, application or system.

data_use.name: System
data_use.description: The source system, product, service or application being improved.

data_use.name: Personalize the capability
data_use.description: Personalize the product, service, application or system.

data_use.name: System
data_use.description: The source system, product, service or application being personalized.

data_use.name: Advertising, Marketing or Promotion
data_use.description: The promotion of products or services targeted to users based on the the processing of user provided data in the system.

data_use.name: First Party Advertising
data_use.description: The promotion of products or services targeting users based on processing of derviced data from prior use of the system.

data_use.name: Third Party Advertising
data_use.description: The promotion of products or services targeting users based on processing of specific categories of data acquired from third party sources.

data_use.name: First Party Contextual Advertising
data_use.description: The promotion of products or services targeted to users based on the processing of derived data from the users prior use of the services.

data_use.name: First Party Personalized Advertising
data_use.description: The targeting and changing of promotional content based on processing of specific data categories from the user.

data_use.name: Third Party Personalized Advertising
data_use.description: The targeting and changing of promotional content based on processing of specific categories of user data acquired from third party sources.

data_use.name: Third Party Sharing
data_use.description: The transfer of specified data categories to third parties outside of the system/application's scope.

data_use.name: Sharing for Processing Payments
data_use.description: Sharing of specified data categories with a third party for payment processing.

data_use.name: Sharing for Personalized Advertising
data_use.description: Sharing of specified data categories for the purpose of marketing/advertising/promotion.

data_use.name: Sharing for Fraud Detection
data_use.description: Sharing of specified data categories with a third party fo fraud prevention/detection.

data_use.name: Sharing for Legal Obligation
data_use.description: Sharing of data for legal obligations, including contracts, applicable laws or regulations.

data_use.name: Collect
data_use.description: Collecting and storing data in order to use it for another purpose such as data training for ML.

data_use.name: Train AI System
data_use.description: Training an AI system. Please note when this data use is specified, the method and degree to which a user may be directly identified in the resulting AI system should be appended.
